CHAT.comment: ATKINSON TRADING COMPANY, INC., Petitioner v. JOE SHIRLEY, JR., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States as 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES G. COLE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARCELINO R. GOMEZ ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BETH S. BRINKMANN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES G. COLE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon at 11:02 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
